description: The Feathered Wolfbat is a curious amalgamation of wolf and bat, with the body of a wolf and the wings and echolocation abilities of a bat. Its fur is interspersed with long feathers, giving it a majestic yet fearsome appearance. It is known to inhabit dense forests, where it uses its flight and sharp senses to hunt prey from above.

traits.name: Keen Hearing
traits.description: The Feathered Wolfbat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

traits.name: Echolocation
traits.description: The Feathered Wolfbat can't use its blindsight while deafened.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The Feathered Wolfbat doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The Feathered Wolfbat makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.
